how do i revert to older version of wine: make sure its still in the resps. Check the wine Package's properties to see if your version is in there.
open up synaptic. right-click on the wine package. select Properties
Click on Versions. See if the version you want is there.
is wine already installed? if so, goto Package -> Force Version... and select the version that you want. then Apply.
is your cache set to delete itself every day or something?
i recommend setting it to not delete anything in your cache.
so if you want to downgrade or create your own package CD, you can use your cache
